name: Shady Puzzles!
description:
-----------------------------------------
INFORMATION
-----------------------------------------
GAME CENTER SUPPORT!

Now comes with 25 Achievements to unlock in Game Center.

If you do not see the achievements unlock on Game Center, simply click the achievement button on the relevant puzzle pack to unlock it on Game Center.

-----------------------------------------
AWESOME REVIEWS!
-----------------------------------------
"It’s little touches like this that make Shady Puzzles a first class app."
By BattleMasters.com

"Shady Puzzles HD for iPad is a new favorite of mine, and I highly recommend it."
By AppleGazette.com

"It is quite addicting, and before you know it, you’ll have filled up the entire grid.."
By AppSafari

"The puzzles are fun and well suited to the iPhone. There's some nice polish there in terms of page turn animations and such."
By MIT Gambit Gamelabs

"Shady Puzzle does what the Daily Shady app does but 10x better."
By Daz4590.co.uk
-----------------------------------------
What's New?
-----------------------------------------
We've rewritten everything from the ground up and now we're ready to present A TOTALLY REVAMPED Shady Puzzles!

The idea behind Shady Puzzles is simple: Why create a standard nonogram app when you can add in TONS of features?

Major AWESOME Features:
- 156 jaw-breaking Puzzles (1 is a secret level :p)!
- Super Awesome Doodle Style Art and Animation!
- Super Awesome Level Progression System!
- Super Awesome Achievements
- FREE HOLIDAY THEMED PUZZLE PACKS
(Click "Change Pack" to select a different packs!)

Included in this SUPER COMPILATION:
- Shady Puzzle Classic!
- Shady Puzzle St. Patrick's Day!
- Shady Puzzle Valentine's Day!
- Shady Puzzle Easter Day!
- Shady Puzzle Singapore Day!

We promise that all FUTURE holiday theme versions will be available as free updates!

ADDITIONAL FEATURES:
- Added New Tutorial based on valuable feedback!
- Added Row/Column Check System to ease our dear puzzlers' eyes!
- Added Pause button during game (FINALLY!)
- Added Music On/Off Button (I know, what were we thinking!?)
- Fixed ALL issues with the old versions (No more crashes for 3g/2nd Gen!)

Upcoming Features:
- Additional Holiday Themed Puzzle Packs!
- Additional Premium Content!
